;----------------------------
; Start of Draggable FARR Support Section
; Added by Swordmaster on 10 Jun 2013
;----------------------------
; FARR-3 section
; straight FARR
0x53740000,2,0,0x03031500,1,0=0x53740000,2,0,0x53740000,0,0
0x53740000,2,0,0x03031500,3,0=0x53740000,2,0,0x53740000,0,0
0x53740000,0,1,0x03031500,1,0=0x53740000,0,1,0x53740000,2,1
0x53740000,0,1,0x03031500,3,0=0x53740000,0,1,0x53740000,2,1
0x53740000,0,0,0x03031500,1,0=0x53740000,0,0,0x53740100,0,0
0x53740000,0,0,0x03031500,3,0=0x53740000,0,0,0x53740100,0,0
0x53740000,2,1,0x03031500,1,0=0x53740000,2,1,0x53740100,2,1
0x53740000,2,1,0x03031500,3,0=0x53740000,2,1,0x53740100,2,1
0x53740100,0,0,0x03000500,1,0=0x53740100,0,0,0x53740200,0,0
0x53740100,2,1,0x03000500,1,0=0x53740100,2,1,0x53740200,2,1
0x53740100,3,0,0x03031500,0,0=0x53740100,3,0,0x53740100,1,0
0x53740100,3,0,0x03031500,2,0=0x53740100,3,0,0x53740100,1,0
0x53740200,3,0,0x03031500,0,0=0x53740200,3,0,0x53740000,1,0
0x53740200,3,0,0x03031500,2,0=0x53740200,3,0,0x53740000,1,0
0x53740200,1,1,0x03031500,0,0=0x53740200,1,1,0x53740000,3,1
0x53740200,1,1,0x03031500,2,0=0x53740200,1,1,0x53740000,3,1
0x53740100,1,1,0x03031500,0,0=0x53740100,1,1,0x53740100,3,1
0x53740100,1,1,0x03031500,2,0=0x53740100,1,1,0x53740100,3,1
; prevent from continuing too far
;0x53740100,0,0,0x03031500,1,0=0,0,0,0,0,0
;0x53740100,0,0,0x03031500,3,0=0,0,0,0,0,0
;0x53740100,2,1,0x03031500,1,0=0,0,0,0,0,0
;0x53740100,2,1,0x03031500,3,0=0,0,0,0,0,0
; three-tile transition to puzzle piece
0x03000500,0,0,0x53740200,3,1=0x53740000,1,1,0x53740200,3,1
0x53740200,3,0,0x03000500,0,0=0x53740200,3,0,0x53740000,1,0
; FARR cul-de-sac
0x03000500,3,0,0x53740000,0,0=0x53740300,0,0,0x53740000,0,0
0x03000500,3,0,0x53740000,2,1=0x53740300,2,1,0x53740000,2,1
0x03000500,3,0,0x53741700,2,0=0x53740300,0,0,0x53741700,2,0
0x03000500,3,0,0x53741700,0,1=0x53740300,2,1,0x53741700,0,1
; FARR to orthogonal
0x03000500,0,0,0x53740000,1,0=0x53741400,3,0,0x53741700,3,0
0x53740000,1,1,0x03000500,0,0=0x53741700,3,1,0x53741400,3,1
0x03000500,2,0,0x53740100,1,0=0x53741300,3,0,0x53741600,3,0
0x53740100,1,1,0x03000500,2,0=0x53741600,3,1,0x53741300,3,1
0x53740200,1,1,0x53741200,3,1=0x53741500,3,1,0x53741200,3,1
0x53741700,2,0,0x53740100,0,0=0x53740000,0,0,0x53740100,0,0
; continue straight FARR
0x53741700,0,0,0x03031500,1,0=0x53741700,0,0,0x53740000,0,0
0x53741700,0,0,0x03031500,3,0=0x53741700,0,0,0x53740000,0,0

0x53741700,2,1,0x03031500,3,0=0x53741700,2,1,0x53740000,2,1
; back-snap ortho-FARR transition
0x53741700,1,0,0x03000500,2,0=0x53741700,1,0,0x53741400,1,0
0x53741600,1,0,0x03000500,0,0=0x53741600,1,0,0x53741300,1,0

0x03031500,3,0,0x53741100,0,0=0x53741000,0,0,0x53741100,0,0
0x53741700,3,1,0x03000500,0,0=0x53741700,3,1,0x53741400,3,1

0x53741500,3,1,0x03000500,0,0=0x53741500,3,1,0x53741200,3,1

0x53741100,0,1,0x03031500,3,0=0x53741100,0,1,0x53741000,0,1
; FARR to diagonal instant snap
0x53743800,0,0,0x53740000,3,1=0x53743800,0,0,0x53743900,0,0
0x53743600,0,0,0x53740100,3,1=0x53743600,0,0,0x53743700,0,0

; diagonal to FARR
0x53743900,3,0,0x03031500,1,0=0x53743900,3,0,0x53740000,2,1
0x53743900,3,0,0x03031500,3,0=0x53743900,3,0,0x53740000,2,1

0x53743900,1,1,0x03031500,3,0=0x53743900,1,1,0x53740000,0,0
; continue from orthogonal DTR C2 switch
0x5394a700,3,0,0x03031500,1,0=0x5394a700,3,0,0x53740000,2,1
0x5394a700,3,0,0x03031500,3,0=0x5394a700,3,0,0x53740000,2,1
